generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Montserrat:wght@300;400;700&family=Yeseva+One&display=swap");*{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}:root{--clr-black:#050505;--clr-white:#f2f2f2;--clr-mustard:#bd7e21;--clr-red:#990d00;--clr-beige:#cab596}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,strong{font-family:Yeseva One,cursive;color:var(--clr-white)}a,li,p{font-family:Montserrat,sans-serif;font-weight:300;color:var(--clr-white)}li{list-style:none}a{text-decoration:none}body{background-color:var(--clr-black);overflow-x:hidden}.wrapper{position:absolute;bottom:20%;left:50%;transform:translateX(-50%);z-index:100;width:100vw;height:50px;overflow:hidden;background-color:#990d00;display:flex;align-items:center;rotate:-13deg}.marquesina{position:relative;display:flex;width:100%}.marquesina-block{flex:1 0 auto;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;font-family:Montserrat,sans-serif;font-weight:600;font-size:30px}.marquesina-text{flex:1 0 auto;margin-left:20px}.wrapper2{position:absolute;bottom:35%;left:50%;transform:translateX(-50%);z-index:100;width:108vw;height:50px;overflow:hidden;background-color:#f2f2f2;display:flex;align-items:center;rotate:5deg}.marquesina2{width:100%}.marquesina2,.marquesina-b{position:relative;display:flex}.marquesina-b{flex:1 0 auto;justify-content:space-between;font-family:Montserrat,sans-serif;font-weight:600;font-size:30px;left:-100%;animation:marquesina 6s linear infinite}.marquesina-t{flex:1 0 auto;margin-left:20px}@keyframes marquesina{0%{left:-100%}to{left:0}}nav{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;padding:1.25rem;margin:1rem clamp(.5rem,2vw,2rem) 0}.logo{position:relative;z-index:100;aspect-ratio:1;background:none;border:none;border-radius:50%}.logo,.logo-face{width:50px;height:50px}.logo-face{border-radius:50%;overflow:hidden;background-color:var(--clr-white)}.face-1{z-index:100}.face-1,.face-2{position:absolute;top:0;right:0}.face-2{z-index:90;transform:translate(-10%,10%);background-color:var(--clr-beige)}.face-3{position:absolute;z-index:80;top:0;right:0;transform:translate(-20%,20%);background-color:var(--clr-white);opacity:1}img.logo-face{height:auto}.logo img{width:100%}.nav-links{display:flex}.nav-link{margin-left:clamp(2rem,5vw,4.5rem)}.nav-link a{font-weight:400}.nav-menu{display:none}@media screen and (max-width:720px){.nav-links{display:none}.nav-menu{display:block;width:50px;height:50px;display:grid;align-content:center}.nav-menu button{display:grid;justify-content:center;border:none;background-color:var(--clr-black);height:fit-content;padding-block:.35rem;padding-inline:.95rem}.bar{margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;height:8px;width:8px;border-radius:50%;margin-bottom:6px}.bar:first-child{width:12.8px;height:12.8px;background-color:var(--clr-mustard)}.bar:nth-child(2){width:10.4px;height:10.4px;background-color:var(--clr-beige)}.bar:last-child{background-color:var(--clr-white)}}@keyframes toggleVisible{0%{background-image:url(baf0840393d7d13f132f9663f2fa50fa.jpg)}14%{background-image:url(76f52c3b8e8e3250a60ef05f9bf7daf9.jpg)}28%{background-image:url(589042e8d68f5e924ee53518d564fae7.jpg)}42%{background-image:url(bdbdc69ea15ad63afdbf08ea57eab61b.jpg)}56%{background-image:url(07b554d34428c5394153415a709292cb.jpg)}71%{background-image:url(4100f90f810190eea484b4152e890cdc.jpg)}85%{background-image:url(4b41702f672bcdf858975baa71ee6285.jpg)}}.flash-container{position:absolute;top:100px;overflow:hidden;width:100%;height:600px}.flash{position:absolute;top:-100px;left:0;z-index:100;height:100vh;width:100vw;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.flash__portrait{position:relative;width:80vw;max-width:450px;height:80vw;max-height:450px;clip-path:polygon(50% 0,100% 50%,50% 100%,0 50%);filter:grayscale(100%) opacity(25%);background-image:url(baf0840393d7d13f132f9663f2fa50fa.jpg);background-size:contain}.flash-animation{animation:toggleVisible .5s ease-in-out infinite}.hero{height:clamp(430px,73vw,70vh);display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;max-width:min(90vw,1080px);margin:auto;padding:clamp(1rem,5vw,6rem) clamp(1rem,5vw,6rem) 0}.hero-right{position:relative;width:30%}@media screen and (min-width:900px){.hero-right{height:28rem}}.hero-left{position:relative;z-index:10;width:70%;display:flex;justify-content:end}.hero-right h1{position:absolute;z-index:20;width:70vw;font-size:clamp(2rem,10vw,5rem)}@media screen and (min-width:900px){.hero-right h1 .h1-fragment-4,.hero-right h1 .h1-fragment-5{font-size:calc(clamp(2rem, 10vw, 5rem)*1.3)}}.hero-right h1 .h1-fragment-5{font-family:Montserrat,sans-serif;font-weight:400}.hero-fragment{display:inline-block}.hero-right strong{color:var(--clr-red)}.hero-bg img{width:100%;max-width:540px;border-right:.25rem solid var(--clr-red)}.content{position:relative;z-index:30;display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr;grid-template-rows:repeat(7,50px);width:80vw;max-width:min(90vw,1080px);margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;margin-top:clamp(2rem,10vw,4rem)}@media screen and (min-width:900px){.content{position:relative;transform:translateY(-24%)}}.content .portrait{position:relative;width:clamp(200px,30vw,450px);height:clamp(250px,32vw,420px);overflow:hidden}.content .portrait img{width:100%}.content .portrait:first-child{justify-self:left}.content .portrait:nth-child(2){justify-self:center}.content .portrait:last-child{justify-self:end}
